00097 template <
00098         typename _NodeBase,
00099         template <typename _i, std::size_t _mi> class _NodeType,
00100         template <typename _k, typename _v> class _NodeItemType,
00101         typename _LeafNode,
00102         typename _KeyType,
00103         std::size_t _max_node_items>
00104 class DiskTreeBackend {
00105 public:
00106         
00107         // types provided to us
00108         typedef _NodeBase                                                                       NodeBase;

00113         typedef UniqueId                                                                        IdType;

00123         enum {
00124                 // defines the descriptor block at the beginning of the file
00125                 node_header_sz = 
00126                         sizeof(uint16_t) +                                      // size of header
00127                         (sizeof(DISKTREE_NODE_MAGIC)-1) +       // signature
00128                         DISKTREE_CUSTOM_SIG_SZ +                        // custom signature
00129                                 
00130                         sizeof(uint32_t) +                                      // height of tree
00131                         record<IdType>::size +                          // node count (max id)
00132                         sizeof(uint32_t) +                                      // max items per node
00133                         
00134                         record<IdType>::size                            // root node id
00135                 ,
00136                 
00137                 leaf_header_sz = 
00138                         sizeof(uint16_t) +                                      // size of leaf header
00139                         (sizeof(DISKTREE_LEAF_MAGIC)-1) +       // signature
00140                         DISKTREE_CUSTOM_SIG_SZ +                        // custom signature
00141                         
00142                         record<IdType>::size +                          // leaf node count (max id)
00143                         sizeof(size_type) +                                     // total leaf items
00144                         sizeof(uint32_t)                                        // max node items
00145         };

00148         // cache type
00149         typedef LRUCache<Node, IdType, LRUDeleteObject>         NodeCache;
00150         typedef typename NodeCache::Node                                        NodeCacheNode;

00152         typedef typename LeafNodeCache::Node                            LeafCacheNode;
00153         
00154         // serializer type
00155         typedef SerializedFile < Node, node_header_sz >         NodeFile;
00156         typedef SerializedFile < LeafNode, leaf_header_sz > LeafNodeFile;

00167                 ERR_CREATE_ROOT_WRITE_NODE,

00176                 m_treeHeight(0),
00177                 m_size(0),

00184                 m_nodeFile(NULL),

00193         ~DiskTreeBackend() 
00194         {
00195                 // cycle through the node cache, and ensure that anything
00196                 // dirty is written back to disk
00197                 
00198                 if (m_initialized)
00199                 {
00200                         if (m_root)
00201                         {
00202                                 if (m_treeHeight == 1)
00203                                 {
00204                                         LeafNode * node = static_cast<LeafNode*>(m_root);
00205                                         if (node->is_dirty)
00206                                                 m_leafNodeFile->SaveObjects(m_rootId, 1, node);
00207                                         delete node;
00208                                 }
00209                                 else
00210                                 {
00211                                         Node * node = static_cast<Node*>(m_root);
00212                                         if (node->is_dirty)
00213                                                 m_nodeFile->SaveObjects(m_rootId, 1, node);
00214                                         delete node;
00215                                 }
00216                         }
00217                 
00218                         // clear the cache, and write all nodes
00219                         ClearCache(m_nodeCache, m_nodeFile);
00220                         ClearCache(m_leafNodeCache, m_leafNodeFile);
00221                 
00222                         // write the headers to disk -- have to ignore errors here
00223                         if (!WriteNodeHeader()){}
00224                         if (!WriteLeafHeader()){}
00225                 }
00226 
00227                 if (m_leafNodeFile)
00228                         delete m_leafNodeFile;
00229                 if (m_leafNodeCache)
00230                         delete m_leafNodeCache;
00231                         
00232                 if (m_nodeFile)
00233                         delete m_nodeFile;
00234                 if (m_nodeCache)
00235                         delete m_nodeCache;
00236         }
00237         
00243         bool Initialize(const Args &args) WARN_IF_UNUSED
00244         {
00245                 wxFileName filename = args.filename;
00246                 custom_signature = args.signature;
00247 
00248                 // load the file
00249                 filename.SetExt(wxT("ndx"));
00250                 m_nodeFile = new NodeFile(filename);
00251                 
00252                 // see if it opened ok
00253                 if (!m_nodeFile->IsOpened())
00254                 {
00255                         SET_BAD_ERROR( ERR_OPEN_NODE_FILE );
00256                         return false;
00257                 }
00258                         
00259                 // try the other file next
00260                 filename.SetExt(wxT("ldx"));
00261                 m_leafNodeFile = new LeafNodeFile(filename);
00262 
00263                 if (!m_leafNodeFile->IsOpened())
00264                 {
00265                         SET_BAD_ERROR( ERR_OPEN_LEAFNODE_FILE );
00266                         return false;
00267                 }
00268 
00269                 if (m_nodeFile->GetFFile()->Length() == 0)
00270                 {
00271                         // new file, write the headers
00272                         if (!WriteNodeHeader())
00273                         {
00274                                 SET_BAD_ERROR( ERR_WRITE_NODE_HEADER );
00275                                 return false;
00276                         }
00277                         
00278                         if (!WriteLeafHeader())
00279                         {
00280                                 SET_BAD_ERROR( ERR_WRITE_LEAF_HEADER );
00281                                 return false;
00282                         }
00283                 }
00284                 else
00285                 {
00286                         // ok, ensure that the thing we're loading is what we expect, or
00287                         // if theres a mismatch
00288                         // new file, write the headers
00289                         if (!ReadNodeHeader())
00290                         {
00291                                 SET_BAD_ERROR( ERR_READ_NODE_HEADER );
00292                                 return false;
00293                         }
00294                         
00295                         if (!ReadLeafHeader())
00296                         {
00297                                 SET_BAD_ERROR( ERR_READ_LEAF_HEADER );
00298                                 return false;
00299                         }
00300                 }
00301                 
00302                 m_nodeCache = new NodeCache(args.nodeCacheSz);
00303                 m_leafNodeCache = new LeafNodeCache(args.leafNodeCacheSz);
00304 
00305                 m_initialized = true;
00306                 return true;
00307         }

00320         void Destroy()
00321         {
00322                 if (m_initialized)
00323                 {
00324                         if (m_root)
00325                         {
00326                                 if (m_treeHeight == 1)
00327                                         delete static_cast<LeafNode*>(m_root);
00328                                 else
00329                                         delete static_cast<Node*>(m_root);
00330                         }
00331 
00332                         delete m_nodeCache; m_nodeCache = NULL;
00333                         delete m_leafNodeCache; m_leafNodeCache = NULL;
00334         
00335                         // delete the files
00336                         m_nodeFile->Delete();
00337                         delete m_nodeFile; m_nodeFile = NULL;
00338                 
00339                         m_leafNodeFile->Delete();
00340                         delete m_leafNodeFile; m_leafNodeFile = NULL;
00341                 
00342                         m_initialized = false;
00343                 }
00344         }
00345         
00346         
00347         
00348         // this creates a new root node and places its ID in m_rootId, you
00349         // MUST hold onto the old ID and place it in the new root node (which
00350         // you will need to retrieve using get_node or get_leaf_node). Each time
00351         // you call this the tree height is incremented
00352         bool create_root_node() WARN_IF_UNUSED
00353         {
00354                 // first, put the old node into the cache
00355                 // then create a new node and place it in the correct places
00356 
00357                 if (m_treeHeight == 0)
00358                 {
00359                         assert(!m_root);
00360                         m_rootId = new_leaf_node_id();
00361                         m_root = new LeafNode();
00362                 }
00363                 else 
00364                 {
00365                         assert(m_root);
00366 
00367                         if (m_treeHeight == 1)
00368                         {
00369                                 LeafCacheNode * removed = m_leafNodeCache->add(m_rootId, static_cast<LeafNode*>(m_root));
00370                                 if (removed && !write_leaf(removed))
00371                                 {
00372                                         SET_BAD_ERROR( ERR_CREATE_ROOT_WRITE_LEAF );
00373                                         return false;
00374                                 }
00375                         }
00376                         else
00377                         {
00378                                 NodeCacheNode * removed = m_nodeCache->add(m_rootId, static_cast<Node*>(m_root));
00379                                 if (removed && !write_node(removed))
00380                                 {
00381                                         SET_BAD_ERROR( ERR_CREATE_ROOT_WRITE_NODE);
00382                                         return false;
00383                                 }
00384                         }
00385 
00386                         m_rootId = new_node_id();
00387                         m_root = new Node();
00388                 }
00389                 
00390                 // dont increment the height if its not null.. 
00391                 return (m_root != NULL && ++m_treeHeight);
00392         }

00401                 return ret;

00405         Node * create_node(const IdType &id)
00406         {
00407                 Node * node = new Node();
00408         
00409                 // add it to the cache
00410                 NodeCacheNode * removed = m_nodeCache->add(id, node);
00411                 
00412                 // if an item is returned, then an item was removed 
00413                 // from the cache, so deal with it
00414                 if (removed && !write_node(removed))
00415                 {
00416                         SET_BAD_ERROR( ERR_CREATE_NODE_WRITE );
00417                         return NULL;
00418                 }
00419                 
00420                 return node;
00421         }

00423 
00424         /*
00425                 gets a node from the cache, or loads it from file
00426         */
00427         Node * get_node(const IdType &id)
00428         {
00429                 // check for m_treeHeight > 1 is implicit:
00430                 assert(m_treeHeight > 1 && "should not happen");
00431                 
00432                 if (id == m_rootId)
00433                         return static_cast<Node*>(m_root);
00434         
00435                 Node * node = m_nodeCache->get(id);
00436                 if (!node)
00437                 {
00438                         node = create_node(id);
00439                         if (!node)
00440                                 return NULL;
00441                         
00442                         // load one object from file
00443                         if (m_nodeFile->LoadObjects(id, 1, node) != 1)
00444                         {
00445                                 SET_BAD_ERROR( ERR_GET_NODE_LOAD );
00446                                 return NULL;
00447                         }
00448                 }
00449                 
00450                 return node;
00451         }

00456                 // removal

00458                 return ret;
00459         }

00479         LeafNode * get_leaf_node(const IdType &id) 
00480         {
00481                 if (m_treeHeight == 1 && id == m_rootId)
00482                         return static_cast<LeafNode*>(m_root);
00483         
00484                 LeafNode * node = m_leafNodeCache->get(id);
00485                 if (!node)
00486                 {
00487                         node = create_leaf_node(id);
00488                         if (!node)
00489                                 return NULL;
00490                         
00491                         // load one object from file
00492                         if (m_leafNodeFile->LoadObjects(id, 1, node) != 1)
00493                         {
00494                                 SET_BAD_ERROR( ERR_GET_LEAFNODE_LOAD );
00495                                 return NULL;
00496                         }
00497                 }
00498                 
00499                 return node;
00500         }

00509         bool write_node(NodeCacheNode * node) WARN_IF_UNUSED
00510         {
00511                 assert(node && "this should never be NULL");
00512                 bool ret = true;
00513         
00514                 // see if it needs to be written back
00515                 if (node->object->is_dirty)
00516                         ret = (m_nodeFile->SaveObjects(node->id, 1, node->object) == 1);
00517                 
00518                 delete node;
00519                 return ret;
00520         }
00521         
00522         bool write_leaf(LeafCacheNode * node) WARN_IF_UNUSED
00523         {
00524                 assert(node && "this should never be NULL");
00525                 bool ret = true;
00526         
00527                 // see if it needs to be written back
00528                 if (node->object->is_dirty)
00529                         ret = (m_leafNodeFile->SaveObjects(node->id, 1, node->object) == 1);
00530                 
00531                 delete node;
00532                 return ret;
00533         }

00536         bool WriteNodeHeader() WARN_IF_UNUSED
00537         {
00538                 unsigned char buffer[node_header_sz];
00539                 int offset = 0;
00540 
00541                 // write header size
00542                 BUFFER_REF(uint16_t, offset) = node_header_sz;
00543                 offset += sizeof(uint16_t);
00544                 
00545                 // our signature (no NULL byte)
00546                 strncpy((char*)(buffer + offset), DISKTREE_NODE_MAGIC, sizeof(DISKTREE_NODE_MAGIC)-1);
00547                 offset += (sizeof(DISKTREE_NODE_MAGIC)-1);
00548                 
00549                 // custom signature
00550                 memset(buffer + offset, 0, DISKTREE_CUSTOM_SIG_SZ);
00551                 strncpy((char*)(buffer + offset), custom_signature.mb_str(), DISKTREE_CUSTOM_SIG_SZ);
00552                 offset += DISKTREE_CUSTOM_SIG_SZ;
00553                 
00554                 // tree height
00555                 BUFFER_REF(uint32_t, offset) = (uint32_t)m_treeHeight;
00556                 offset += sizeof(uint32_t);
00557                 
00558                 // node count
00559                 record<IdType>::serialize(m_node_count, buffer + offset);
00560                 offset += record<IdType>::size;
00561                 
00562                 // max node items
00563                 BUFFER_REF(uint32_t, offset) = (uint32_t)_max_node_items;               
00564                 offset += sizeof(uint32_t);
00565                 
00566                 // root node item (if its valid -- valgrind complains)
00567                 if (m_root)
00568                         record<IdType>::serialize(m_rootId, buffer + offset);
00569                 else
00570                         memset(&buffer[offset], 0, record<IdType>::size);
00571                 offset += record<IdType>::size;
00572 
00573 
00574                 assert(offset == node_header_sz);
00575                 
00576                 // and write it to file
00577                 wxFFile * file = m_nodeFile->GetFFile();
00578                 file->Seek(0);
00579                 if (file->Write(buffer, node_header_sz) != node_header_sz)
00580                         return false;
00581                 file->Flush();
00582                 
00583                 return true;
00584         }
00585         
00586         bool WriteLeafHeader() WARN_IF_UNUSED
00587         {
00588                 unsigned char buffer[leaf_header_sz];
00589                 int offset = 0;
00590 
00591                 // write header size
00592                 BUFFER_REF(uint16_t, offset) = leaf_header_sz;
00593                 offset += sizeof(uint16_t);
00594                 
00595                 // our signature (no NULL byte)
00596                 strncpy((char*)(buffer + offset), DISKTREE_LEAF_MAGIC, sizeof(DISKTREE_LEAF_MAGIC)-1);
00597                 offset += (sizeof(DISKTREE_LEAF_MAGIC)-1);
00598                 
00599                 // custom signature
00600                 memset(buffer + offset, 0, DISKTREE_CUSTOM_SIG_SZ);
00601                 strncpy((char*)(buffer + offset), custom_signature.mb_str(), DISKTREE_CUSTOM_SIG_SZ);
00602                 offset += DISKTREE_CUSTOM_SIG_SZ;
00603                 
00604                 // leaf count
00605                 record<IdType>::serialize(m_leaf_node_count, buffer + offset);
00606                 offset += record<IdType>::size;
00607 
00608                 // number of leaf items
00609                 BUFFER_REF(size_type, offset) = m_size;
00610                 offset += sizeof(size_type);
00611                 
00612                 // max node items
00613                 BUFFER_REF(uint32_t, offset) = (uint32_t)_max_node_items;               
00614                 offset += sizeof(uint32_t);
00615 
00616                 
00617                 assert(offset == leaf_header_sz);
00618                 
00619                 // and write it to file
00620                 wxFFile * file = m_leafNodeFile->GetFFile();
00621                 file->Seek(0);
00622                 if (file->Write(buffer, leaf_header_sz) != leaf_header_sz)
00623                         return false;
00624                 
00625                 file->Flush();
00626                 return true;
00627         }
00628         
00629         
00630         bool ReadNodeHeader() WARN_IF_UNUSED
00631         {
00632                 unsigned char buffer[node_header_sz];
00633                 wxFFile * file = m_nodeFile->GetFFile();
00634                 
00635                 file->Seek(0);
00636                 if (file->Read(buffer, node_header_sz) != node_header_sz)
00637                         return false;
00638         
00639                 int offset = 0;
00640                 
00641                 // header sz
00642                 if (BUFFER_REF(uint16_t, offset) != node_header_sz)
00643                         return false;
00644                 offset += sizeof(uint16_t);
00645                 
00646                 // signature
00647                 if (strncmp((char*)(buffer + offset), DISKTREE_NODE_MAGIC, sizeof(DISKTREE_NODE_MAGIC)-1))
00648                         return false;
00649                 offset += (sizeof(DISKTREE_NODE_MAGIC)-1);
00650                 
00651                 // custom signature
00652                 if (strncmp((char*)(buffer + offset), custom_signature.mb_str(), DISKTREE_CUSTOM_SIG_SZ))
00653                         return false;
00654                 offset += DISKTREE_CUSTOM_SIG_SZ;
00655                 
00656                 // height
00657                 m_treeHeight = BUFFER_REF(uint32_t, offset);
00658                 offset += sizeof(uint32_t);
00659                         
00660                 // node count
00661                 m_node_count = record<IdType>::deserialize(buffer + offset);;
00662                 offset += record<IdType>::size;
00663                 
00664                 // max node items
00665                 if (BUFFER_REF(uint32_t, offset) != (uint32_t)_max_node_items)
00666                         return false;
00667                 offset += sizeof(uint32_t);
00668                         
00669                 // root node id
00670                 m_rootId = record<IdType>::deserialize(buffer + offset);;
00671                 offset += record<IdType>::size;
00672         
00673         
00674                 assert(offset == node_header_sz);
00675                 
00676                 // try to load the root node of the tree from file
00677                 if (m_treeHeight > 1)
00678                 {
00679                         m_root = new Node();
00680                         if (!m_nodeFile->LoadObjects(m_rootId, 1, static_cast<Node*>(m_root)))
00681                                 return false;
00682                 }
00683                 
00684                 return true;
00685         }
00686         
00687         bool ReadLeafHeader() WARN_IF_UNUSED
00688         {               
00689                 unsigned char buffer[node_header_sz];
00690                 wxFFile * file = m_leafNodeFile->GetFFile();
00691                 
00692                 file->Seek(0);
00693                 if (file->Read(buffer, leaf_header_sz) != leaf_header_sz)
00694                         return false;
00695         
00696                 int offset = 0;
00697                 
00698                 // header sz
00699                 if (BUFFER_REF(uint16_t, offset) != leaf_header_sz)
00700                         return false;
00701                 offset += sizeof(uint16_t);
00702                 
00703                 // signature
00704                 if (strncmp((char*)(buffer + offset), DISKTREE_LEAF_MAGIC, sizeof(DISKTREE_LEAF_MAGIC)-1))
00705                         return false;
00706                 offset += (sizeof(DISKTREE_LEAF_MAGIC)-1);
00707                 
00708                 // custom signature
00709                 if (strncmp((char*)(buffer + offset), custom_signature.mb_str(), DISKTREE_CUSTOM_SIG_SZ))
00710                         return false;
00711                 offset += DISKTREE_CUSTOM_SIG_SZ;
00712                         
00713                 // leaf count
00714                 m_leaf_node_count = record<IdType>::deserialize(buffer + offset);
00715                 offset += record<IdType>::size;
00716 
00717                 m_size = BUFFER_REF(size_type, offset);
00718                 offset += sizeof(size_type);
00719                 
00720                 // max node items
00721                 if (BUFFER_REF(uint32_t, offset) != (uint32_t)_max_node_items)
00722                         return false;
00723                 offset += sizeof(uint32_t);
00724                         
00725         
00726                 assert(offset == leaf_header_sz);
00727                 
00728                 // try to load the root node of the tree from file
00729                 if (m_treeHeight == 1)
00730                 {
00731                         m_root = new LeafNode();
00732                         if (!m_leafNodeFile->LoadObjects(m_rootId, 1, static_cast<LeafNode*>(m_root)))
00733                                 return false;
00734                 }
00735                 
00736                 return true;
00737         }
00738 
00739         template <typename CacheType, typename NodeFileType>
00740         void ClearCache(CacheType * cache, NodeFileType * file)
00741         {
00742                 typename CacheType::Node * cacheItem;
00743                         
00744                 while ((cacheItem = cache->removeOne()))
00745                 {
00746                         // see if it needs to be written back
00747                         if (cacheItem->object->is_dirty)
00748                                 file->SaveObjects(cacheItem->id, 1, cacheItem->object);
00749                         
00750                         delete cacheItem;
00751                 }
00752         }
